page.title: 19Greyhound Racing.
page.content: My dad started racing greyhounds about 3 months ago, but we have had dogs for about 9 months. We had to train them up because if they are not the right weight, they will not run right. The best our dog has run was in a long race and his weight was 66lb. There are long and short races. We train our dogs every night and day. We race our dogs at Kinsley, Highgate, Askern and Doncaster. We feed them on food with lots of vitamins or their bones would not be strong and then the dogs wouldn't run right. When the dogs are racing they have to be muzzled so that they can't bite when you are putting them into the traps. It also stops them from biting the wire which the hare goes round on. If you wanted to start racing dogs you would have to walk them 2 to 3 miles on a morning and the same every night.
